attributes.additional_details: Test Match Special has been bringing cricket commentary for years and years and should not be sidelined.
attributes.background: Test Match Special is a National Institution. The way it presents cricket is second to none. They have brilliant commentary and is unique. Some things deserve to stay and cricket commentary on Test Match Special should be forever. It shouldn't be about sponsorship and advertising.

rejection.details: This decision was made by the Sri Lankan and West Indies cricket boards, not the UK Government and Parliament.
